titleInfo.title: Gospel and Spiritual All-Nite Singing Concert at Decaturville Gym

mods.abstract: Two color window card (red on yellow) Hatch poster announcing the Gospel and Spiritual All-Nite Singing Concert featuring Wally Fowler, Klaudt Indian Family, and Southern Harmony Quartet at the Decaturville, Gym on June 13.
